assumption (BELIEF)
More examplesFewer examplesWe should start from the premise that circumstances might change.The conclusions you have drawn are based on a false premise.We should work on the premise that this plan will be successful.Could you explain the basic premise of your argument?Your reasoning is based on a misguided premise.
